wsdl:definitions.wsdl:documentation: Rapid 3.0 allows you to use your own payment page, but transmits credit card data directly from the customer's browser to eWAY's gateway, bypassing your servers entirely. This provides enhanced security without impeding your freedom to customise the checkout process.

wsdl:operation.name: CancelAuthorisation
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Cancels a previous transaction where the Method was AUTHORISE

wsdl:operation.name: CapturePayment
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Captures payment against a previously authorised transaction.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateAccessCode
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns an access code and echoes the customer data received in the request. The access code is used for all further requests associated with this transaction.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateAccessCodeShared
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns an access code and a return Url which inidicates to a highly secure page hosted at eWaypayments site.

wsdl:operation.name: GetAccessCodeResult
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Using a previously created access code, a merchant can request all the relevant details of a transaction from eWAY.

wsdl:operation.name: DirectPayment
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: PCI compliant customers can call DirectPayment to create payments with or without CVN information

wsdl:operation.name: DirectAuthorisation
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: PCI compliant customers can call DirectAuthorisation to create authorisations with or without CVN information

wsdl:operation.name: DirectCustomerCreate
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: PCI compliant customers can call DirectCustomerCreate to create token customers and save credit card data.

wsdl:operation.name: DirectCustomerUpdate
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: PCI compliant customers can call DirectCustomerCreate to create token customers and save credit card data.

wsdl:operation.name: DirectRefund
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: This method allows merchants to refund an existing transaction.

wsdl:operation.name: DirectCustomerSearch
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of customers that match the filter in the request.

wsdl:operation.name: TransactionSearch
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of transactions that match the filter in the request.

wsdl:operation.name: SettlementSearch
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of settlement summaries or settlement transactions that match the filter in the request.

wsdl:operation.name: APICodeLookup
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns a list of user message that match the given API codes

wsdl:operation.name: APICredentials
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Master Users can Upsert API Credentials for specific users.

wsdl:service.name: Rapid3.0
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation: Rapid 3.0 allows you to use your own payment page, but transmits credit card data directly from the customer's browser to eWAY's gateway, bypassing your servers entirely. This provides enhanced security without impeding your freedom to customise the checkout process.
